-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | stringly-named getters for generic data
--   
@package generic-accessors
@version 0.4.0

module Accessors

-- | Things which you can make a tree of labeled getters for. You should
--   derive this using GHC.Generics.
class Lookup a where toAccessorTree x get set = gtoAccessorTree (from x) (from . get) (set . to)
toAccessorTree :: Lookup a => a -> (b -> a) -> (a -> b -> b) -> AccessorTree b
data AccessorTree a
Data :: (String, String) -> [(String, AccessorTree a)] -> AccessorTree a
ATGetter :: (Getter a, Setter a) -> AccessorTree a
data Setter a
SetBool :: (Bool -> a -> a) -> Setter a
SetDouble :: (Double -> a -> a) -> Setter a
SetFloat :: (Float -> a -> a) -> Setter a
SetInt :: (Int -> a -> a) -> Setter a

-- | not yet implemented
SetSorry :: Setter a
data Getter a
GetBool :: (a -> Bool) -> Getter a
GetDouble :: (a -> Double) -> Getter a
GetFloat :: (a -> Float) -> Getter a
GetInt :: (a -> Int) -> Getter a

-- | not yet implemented
GetSorry :: Getter a
accessors :: Lookup a => a -> AccessorTree a
flatten :: AccessorTree a -> [(String, Getter a, Setter a)]

-- | Show a tree of values
showTree :: AccessorTree a -> (Double -> String) -> a -> String

-- | Show a list of values . True --&gt; align the colums, False --&gt;
--   total mayhem
showFlat :: AccessorTree a -> Bool -> (Double -> String) -> a -> String
instance Lookup a => Lookup (Euler a)
instance Lookup a => Lookup (V3T f a)
instance Lookup a => Lookup (Rot f1 f2 a)
instance Lookup CDouble
instance Lookup CFloat
instance Lookup CSUSeconds
instance Lookup CUSeconds
instance Lookup CTime
instance Lookup CClock
instance Lookup CUIntMax
instance Lookup CIntMax
instance Lookup CUIntPtr
instance Lookup CIntPtr
instance Lookup CULLong
instance Lookup CLLong
instance Lookup CSigAtomic
instance Lookup CWchar
instance Lookup CSize
instance Lookup CPtrdiff
instance Lookup CULong
instance Lookup CLong
instance Lookup CUInt
instance Lookup CInt
instance Lookup CUShort
instance Lookup CShort
instance Lookup CUChar
instance Lookup CSChar
instance Lookup CChar
instance Lookup Int64
instance Lookup Int32
instance Lookup Int16
instance Lookup Int8
instance Lookup Word64
instance Lookup Word32
instance Lookup Word16
instance Lookup Word8
instance Lookup Word
instance Lookup Bool
instance Lookup Double
instance Lookup Float
instance Lookup Int
instance Lookup ()
instance (Datatype d, Constructor c, GLookupS a) => GLookup (D1 d (C1 c a))
instance (GLookupS f, GLookupS g) => GLookupS (f :*: g)
instance GLookupS U1
instance (Selector s, GLookup a) => GLookupS (S1 s a)
instance Lookup f => GLookup (Rec0 f)
instance Lookup a => Lookup (Quaternion a)
instance Lookup a => Lookup (V4 a)
instance Lookup a => Lookup (V3 a)
instance Lookup a => Lookup (V2 a)
instance Lookup a => Lookup (V1 a)
instance Lookup a => Lookup (V0 a)
instance Show (AccessorTree a)
